segments.text: Can I take your order now , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm happy to recommend the fish , It testes delicious , and it is today's special . Our chef is from the coast , and love seafood . Today special is actually his favorite dish . so I'm sure it is a
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It does sound wonderful , maybe I'll try it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else ? Maybe I can interest you in one of fine appetizers , such as the escargot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not today , thanks . But I'd like to know any of the vegetarian dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , here's the menu . What would you think of your order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe I don't want the fish , I think I had the greenbean dish instead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of soup would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like the egg drop soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what would you like anything to drink or you wait ?
